Text: The MCA's collapse is swift.
Uh... U-Uhh...
Humph.
Empty, I see.
Wait, um... I can explain this.
Arrest him.
Yes, ma'am!
Please, wait! This is all just a misunderstandingâ€”
Garter Kikuchi.
Eeep!

Your aggressive actions are behind the recent market
turmoil and the disruptions in the kingdom's monetary
circulationâ€”

When the masses can't exchange their money at the
MCA's bank, they immediately turn to Mitsugoshi.
There are enough of them to pack the main street
completely full.

When the bank opens, they rush in, paper bills in
hand. What they find inside shocks them. Mitsugoshi
Bank is using a large hall as their vault, and there
is a dazzling mountain of gold piled up within.

We're ready to exchange your paper bills. Please form
a line and wait your turn. We'll assist you as soon
as possible.

When the people in the crowd see Mitsugoshi Bank
fulfill exchange request after exchange request, one
of them turns to leave and then another.

By the time noon rolls around, the line has dwindled
to almost nothing.

With that, the series of tumultuous events finally
comes to a close.

After a night's rest in the capital, Yukime heads to
the hideout.
Lady Yukime!
I'm so relieved you're safe...!
Sorry for worrying you.
Mr. Smith took off after you...
Speaking of which, where is he?
That man...
He's likely gone to mourn...

Reflecting on the serene look on Gettan's face,
reminiscent of bygone days, Yukime wonders
if he had been searching for a place to die in
peace.
Mr. Smith is truly a kind-hearted man...
What the...?
The vault has been completely cleaned out.
You must be Yukime of the White Tower.
*gasp*

I'm Alpha of the Shadow Garden. Judging by your
reactions, he hasn't mentioned me.
*gasp*
You must be his accomplice and...
...Gettan's beloved.
This is for you.
The MCA is about to collapse.

We retrieved what we could before the Midgar Kingdom
launched their investigation.

We found it in Gettan's room. The writing is
distorted and hard to read, but it's likely
intended for youâ€”
His messy handwriting...
It isn't just because of his blindness.

He never really liked desk work. I often used to
transcribe important letters for him...

The Cult of Diablos, that's the true identity of the
organization that incited Gettan.
The Cult...

They prey on a person's weakness, cloud their vision,
and lure them into the darkness... We're at war with
them.
Of course, he is too.
He...
John Smith, no...
Shadow.
Mitsugoshi is just a front for the Shadow Garden.
*gasp*
He orchestrated everything from the beginning.
I'm sorry, but we've taken all the gold coins.

My guess is that Mitsugoshi plans to use them to
ride out the credit collapse.

Once we control the MCA's distribution channels,
our dominance will be inevitable.
Mr. Shadow saw all this coming from the start...

If that makes you see him as a traitor, that's on
you. He's prepared to take on that label.
...I don't see him that way.
In that case, we're ready to welcome you.

Mitsugoshi manages the public front, while I handle
what goes on behind the scenes... I see.
I look forward to working with you.
Likewise.

Yukime and Alpha exchange matching smiles,
revealing an unspoken bond of mutual respect.
